entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 30 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
